title: Boiled Corn On The Cob
subTitle: Classic boiled corn on the cob recipe
story: Wondering how long to boil corn on the cob? We've got you covered with this classic boiled corn on the cob recipe.

instructions.step: Peel the corn on the cob and remove the silks.
Fill a large stock pot or dutch oven about half full with water. Bring the water to a boil over medium heat.
Add the peeled corn on the cob. Cover and return to a boil. Cook for 5-7 minutes.
Remove the corn on the cob from the hot water and place on a platter. Serve while hot with butter and salt.

notes.item: Adding a cup of sugar to the boiling water makes the corn super sweet
